description: When you have nine plus inches and two bowling ball sized nuts that pump out enough jizz to be a one man-sperm bank, you can an idea of who we are dealing with here. Of course after seeing that lump in jeans that seems to reach halfway to his knee, it's those pants you will want to get into in record time, but man, does he ever tease you with a massive bulge inside his stretched snowy white briefs that rivet your attention until you want to get down on your knees and rip those fuckers off with your teeth!Manny is a man of few words with the quiet confidence of being comfortable in his own skin. He is  a power top on the hunt for the perfect 'power bottom.'  Sometimes I doubt if all the 'strict tops' stay that way behind closed door but Manny is the real deal; he definitely believes its is better to give then to receive. He was already very horny when he walked in the door and busted a nut pretty quickly, but promised that he had another one in there for us....so without a break, the stud keeps on going...maybe we should have called him the energizer bunny.
title: Power Top, Scene #02
